text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, magued ʙa Pajomʙar Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam)-«ro'ino», zero jahudijon ʙa Pajomʙar sallallohu alajhi va sallam "ro'ino" meguftand. Va qasdi onho daşnom ʙud. Bigued ej mū'minon: ʙa ivazi "Ro'ino", "Unzurno", ja'ne. "ʙa mo nigoh kun!". Va nek ʙişnaved, az kitoʙi Parvardigoraton, on ci ki tilovat karda meşavad. Va inkorkunandagonro azoʙi dardovar ast
